trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um tipo de coluna está visível no designer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, os tipos derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> aparecem na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> partes de controle específicos do designer do Visual Studio, mas herdar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> para impedir que aparecem em outras partes do designer.

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Isso é necessário porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> tipo implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, que normalmente faz com que uma instância do tipo apareça no designer.

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: Use esse atributo para impedir que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> tipo apareçam no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> designer de controle específicos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o uso de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class using the default <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> usando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> padrão de <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class using the specified value to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> usando o valor especificado para inicializar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value, which is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes" />, indicating that the column is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> padrão, que é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes" />, indica que a coluna é visível no designer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> valor da propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esse objeto é equivalente ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> instance with the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property value as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o objeto especificado é uma instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> com o mesmo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> que essa instância; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash do inteiro assinado de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância de atributo é igual ao valor do atributo <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que esta instância é igual à instância <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> que indica que a coluna não é visível no designer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> valor da propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o tipo de coluna está visível o designer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o tipo de coluna está visível no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value indicating that the column is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> que indica que a coluna é visível no designer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> valor da propriedade `true`.
